prod_short_desc: Patrol the Scarif coastline with the armored Stormtrooper!
prod_long_desc:
Defend the Empire’s territory with this buildable and highly posable LEGO® Star Wars Scarif Stormtrooper figure. Featuring a double-barrel blaster rifle with spring-loaded shooter and stud shooter, plus decorated helmet and armor, this sturdy and durable figure is great for recreating unforgettable action scenes from the movie, Star Wars: Rogue One.
Buildable and highly posable Scarif Stormtrooper figure features a double-barrel blaster rifle with spring-loaded shooter and stud shooter, plus decorated helmet and armor.
Keep the rebels at bay with the powerful spring-loaded shooter and stud shooter.
Move the limbs into any battle pose.
Extra ammo included.
Features a sturdy and durable design for intense action play.
Play out exciting hand-to-hand battles with this specialized Stormtrooper from the blockbuster movie, Star Wars: Rogue One.
This figure offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 7-14.
Battle 75524 Chirrut Îmwe and 75525 Baze Malbus for amazing Imperial vs. Rebel action!
Figure stands over 9” tall.
